title: LIVE NOW! hangouts + youtube - Social - 0x00sec - The Home of the Hacker

data.author: nugget
data.speak: We are live from irc.0x00sec.org on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=co1TlVcc66Q hangouts link is in the video, free to come join and say hi!

data.author: fxbg
data.speak: mwhahah too bad my damn connection was shitty today plus work tonight kept me from hanging out. My chrome extension was making horrible feedback, etc, etc

data.author: nugget
data.speak: yeah man that was brutal lol

data.author: nugget
data.speak: Next one in a month, friday though next time  perhaps with some agenda of some sort lol

data.author: REal0day
data.speak: This looks like fun! TFTI @Sirius.Also, what’s up with IRC?Invitation required for #0x00sec ??

data.author: PaperSkin
data.speak: Yeah IRC hasn’t been working for me either since last week.

data.author: fxbg
data.speak: There were some kiddies messing about (spamming, relentless reconnects) so it seems only useful to make it by invite only, I think it’s better. You’ll also need a voice to use #0x00sec as well I believe.Join us in #public on the irc, you’ll see all the familiar faces, come on in

data.author: nugget
data.speak: Never fear nugget is here, due to the amount of requests will be looking at making shows weekly, that would be 3 on topic, 1 random AF

data.author: Bowlslaw
data.speak: I wanna join the next one and blow your minds

data.author: Techno_Forg
data.speak: IRC is back to normal as far as I know. Please join #0x00sec at irc.0x00sec.org/6697

data.author: system
data.speak: This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
